mapper.insert: insert into tb_request_header_log ( app_id, user_os, os_version, app_version, agent_model, user_agent, agent_num, interface_name, ip_address, ip_country, ip_area, ip_province, ip_city, uuid, operate_id, cost_time, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{tbRequestHeaderLog.appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.userOs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.osVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.agentModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.agentNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.ipCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.ipArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.ipProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.ipCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.operateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbRequestHeaderLog.costTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now() )
